code: @Manual{,   title = {YTAnalytics: Wrapper for 'YouTube Analytics' API},   author = {Jake Davis},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.2.1, https://davisj95.github.io/YTAnalytics/},   url = {https://github.com/davisj95/YTAnalytics}, }

title: Wrapper for YouTube Analytics API
text: YTAnalytics R package designed simplify data collection using YouTube Analytics API. can use get channel, playlist, video data YouTube channel - just like found YouTube Studio. Helpful data includes: Video/Playlist/Channel Statistics Daily/Monthly Views Location Data (Country/City) Demographics (Age/Gender) Devices Traffic Sources Sharing Services

title: Wrapper for YouTube Analytics API
text: YTAnalytics built around one main function - analytics_request() acts wrapper YouTube Analytics API. youtube_GET simplifies making GET requests using httr::GET structuring returned data data.frame. data_channel_request(), data_playlist_request(), data_playlistItem_request(), data_video_request() wrappers YouTube Data API, meant help getting high level data returning lists videos channel playlist. purpose, added functionality present. YouTube Data API functionality, refer tuber package. learn YouTube Analytics API experiment built-app, check .

title: Wrapper for YouTube Analytics API
text: order use YouTube APIs, need following: Create Project Google Developers Console. Enable YouTube Data YouTube Analytics APIs developer library. Create OAuth consent screen. Create OAuth authorization credentials. client Id Secret, use youtube_oauth() like following: authentication token created (default stored file called .httr-oauth) saved working directory.

title: Wrapper for YouTube Analytics API
text: authenticated, many functions choose . Functions mostly fall three categories: channel, playlist, video data. function leads category name followed particular function. example:

title: Wrapper for YouTube Analytics API
code: # To get views, averageViewDuration, estimatedMinutesWatched, shares, likes,  # dislikes, comments, subscribersGained & subscribersLost # From Jan 1, 2000 - Today channel_stats()  # For Jan 1, 2020 - Jan 1, 2021 channel_stats(startDate = "2020-01-01", endDate = "2021-01-01")  # To get only views, averageViewDuration and estimatedMinutesWatched for all time channel_stats(metrics = "views,averageViewDuration,estimatedMinutesWatched").  #Note that there are no spaces between metrics

title: Wrapper for YouTube Analytics API
code: myPlaylist <- YOURPLAYLISTID  playlist_daily_views(playlistId = myPlaylist)  playlist_live_onDemand(playlistId = myPlaylist)

title: Wrapper for YouTube Analytics API
text: none pre-built functions quite need, can always refer back analytics_request() function custom requests.
code: myVideo <- YOURVIDEOID  video_audience_retention(videoId = myVideo)  video_top_countries(videoId = myVideo) analytics_request(dimensions = "country",                   metrics = "views",                   filter = "video==YOURVIDEO",                   sort = "-views",                   maxResults = 50)

title: Wrapper for YouTube Analytics API
text: youtube_oauth() channel_time_period() playlist_time_period() video_time_period() channel_live_onDemand() playlist_live_onDemand() video_live_onDemand() channel_playback_location() playlist_playback_location() video_playback_location() channel_stats() playlist_stats() video_stats() channel_countries() playlist_countries() video_countries() channel_cities() playlist_cities() video_cities() channel_demographics() playlist_demographics() video_demographics() channel_devices() playlist_devices() video_devices() channel_traffic_sources() playlist_traffic_sources() video_traffic_sources() channel_traffic_details() playlist_traffic_details() video_traffic_details() channel_top_sharing_services() playlist_top_sharing_services() video_top_sharing_services() channel_subscription_status() playlist_subscription_status() video_subscription_status() channel_top_videos() playlist_top_videos() channel_videos() playlist_videos() video_audience_retention() playlist_metadata() video_metadata() analytics_request() data_channel_request() data_playlist_request() data_playlistItem_request() data_video_request()

what: Analytics Request Function - YouTube Analytics API — analytics_request
title: Analytics Request Function - YouTube Analytics API — analytics_request
text: function make API calls YouTube Analytics API. functions package wrappers function arguments already populated. none prebuilt functions work use case, function turn .

title: Analytics Request Function - YouTube Analytics API — analytics_request
code: analytics_request(   dimensions = NULL,   metrics = "views,estimatedMinutesWatched",   sort = NULL,   maxResults = 10,   filters = NULL,   startDate = "2000-01-01",   endDate = as.character(Sys.Date()),   ids = "channel==MINE",   currency = NULL,   startIndex = NULL,   includeHistoricalChannelData = NULL,   token = getOption("YouTube_Token") )

title: Analytics Request Function - YouTube Analytics API — analytics_request
text: dimensions String. See https://developers.google.com/youtube/analytics/dimensions valid arguments. metrics String. See https://developers.google.com/youtube/analytics/metrics valid arguments. sort String. Specify metric/dimensions sort output applicable. maxResults Integer. Specify number results return. Maximum 200. filters String. Specify dimension filter applicable. Ex: video==dQw4w9WgXcQ startDate Required. String specifying start date. endDate Required. String specifying end date. ids Required. Specify channel. default function specify "channel==MINE" currency String. Specify currency applicable startIndex Integer. Specify index first entity retrieve, applicable. includeHistoricalChannelData String. Indicates whether API response include channels' watch time view data time period prior channels linked content owner. applies content owner reports. Either 'true' 'false'. token Required.

title: Analytics Request Function - YouTube Analytics API — analytics_request
Analytics Request Function - YouTube Analytics API — analytics_request
Channel City Data — channel_cities
text: Returns top cities views. Data available January 1, 2022.

title: Channel Live & OnDemand Data — channel_live_onDemand
text: Return channel data split live & demand.

title: Channel Playback Location — channel_playback_location
text: Returns type page application video playbacks occurred.

title: Channel Time Period Views — channel_time_period
text: period Required. Time period breakdown data . Supported values day month endDate Required. String. Data returned last day specified, monthly period end date must end day 01 ... Addt. arguments passed analytics_request

title: Channel Traffic Sources Data — channel_traffic_details
text: Returns top traffic sources views.  Check https://developers.google.com/youtube/analytics/dimensions#Traffic_Source_Dimensions information.

title: Channel Traffic Sources Data — channel_traffic_details
text: trafficType Required. String. Type traffic source. ... Addt. arguments passed analytics_request

title: Channel Videos List — channel_videos
text: Returns videos channel. Note: July 2023, YouTube Data API fails return videos channel getting videos "uploads" playlist large YouTube channels. result function's work-around pull additional playlists channel, pull video lists playlists, append result uploads return.

what: Channel Data Requests - YouTube Data API — data_channel_request
title: Channel Data Requests - YouTube Data API — data_channel_request
text: function make API calls YouTube Data API channel specific data. can called directly, primarily intended help get lists videos within channel. -depth use Data API, please refer tuber. details following arguments, please refer https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3/docs/channels/list

title: Channel Data Requests - YouTube Data API — data_channel_request
code: data_channel_request(   part = NULL,   categoryId = NULL,   forUsername = NULL,   hl = NULL,   id = NULL,   managedByMe = NULL,   maxResults = 5,   mine = NULL,   onBehalfOfContentOwner = NULL,   pageToken = NULL,   token = getOption("YouTube_Token") )

title: Channel Data Requests - YouTube Data API — data_channel_request
text: part Required. String. categoryId String. forUsername String. hl String. id String. managedByMe String. maxResults Integer. mine String. onBehalfOfContentOwner String. pageToken String. token Required.

title: YouTube API OAuth — youtube_oauth
text: creates grabs token authorize API requests

title: YouTube API OAuth — youtube_oauth
code: youtube_oauth(   clientId = NULL,   clientSecret = NULL,   tokenFile = ".httr-oauth",   useOOB = FALSE,   setEnvVar = FALSE,   scopes = c("https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtube.readonly",     "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/yt-analytics.readonly"),   reAuthOnFail = FALSE )

title: YouTube API OAuth — youtube_oauth
text: clientId Required. Client Id obtained console.cloud.google.com. clientSecret Required. Client Secret obtained console.cloud.google.com tokenFile name token httr-oauth file read token . file exist one created provided name. useOOB TRUE, use oob method copy/paste token R. setEnvVar TRUE, create environment variable called "YouTube_Token" store token. scopes Scopes must passed authenticating. See https://developers.google.com/youtube/analytics/reference information. reAuthOnFail TRUE, automatically begin authentication process provided token expired.

title: YTAnalytics 0.2.0 2024-08-29
text: CRAN release: 2024-08-29 Added error checking functionality reading token file. Previously token file read print message saying token successfully read, token expired user wouldn’t know making request. Added progress bar help track progress passing vectors video/playlist ids Added playlist_metadata function. Fixed misc bugs like incorrect parameters passed functions passing parameters didn’t exist Added github pages website (davisj95.github.io/YTAnalytics) Removed documentation internal functions aren’t meant called directly

title: YTAnalytics 0.1.0 2023-09-13
text: CRAN release: 2023-09-14 Allows vector video ids playlist ids passed video playlist functions. Fixed issue dates dates passed characters threw errors. Date objects strings acceptable now. Fixed issues playlist functions ;isCurated==1 missing filters. Removed playlist_cities playlist city information made available API. Fixed typo playback_location file name Changed error_checking message warning

title: YTAnalytics 0.0.5 2023-08-28
text: CRAN release: 2023-08-28 Fixed issues functions passing multiple metric parameters analytics_request, threw error get_stats functions traffic functions. Fixed issue channel_videos incorrect uploads playlistId passed. Fixed issue metadata functions attempted filter columns didn’t exist. Fixed issue youtube_oauth creating token scratch threw errors.
